text: John McEnroe and Patrick McEnroe were the defending champions, but were eliminated in the round-robin stage. Guy Forget and Henri Leconte won the title, defeating Cédric Pioline and Mark Woodforde in the final, 4–6, 7–6(7–5), [10–3]. ==Draw== ===Final=== ===Group C=== Standings are determined by: 1) Number of wins; 2) Number of matches; 3) In three-players-ties, percentage of sets won, or of games won; 4) Steering Committee decision. ===Group D=== Standings are determined by: 1) Number of wins; 2) Number of matches; 3) In three-players-ties, percentage of sets won, or of games won; 4) Steering Committee decision. ==References== *Main Draw Legends Over 45 Doubles
title: 2015 French Open – Legends Over 45 Doubles
